org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.symbols
Class SmartTextSymbol

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.AbstractSymbol
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.SimpleTextSymbol
          org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.symbols.SmartTextSymbol
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.CartographicSupport, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.IPrintable, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.ISymbol, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.ITextSymbol, com.iver.utiles.IPersistence
public class SmartTextSymbol
extends com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.SimpleTextSymbol
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.ITextSymbol

Class used to create symbols composed using a text defined by the user.This text can be edited (changing the color, the font of the characters, and the rotation of the text)and has the property that can follow a path.If this path does not exist, the text is treated as a simpletextsymbol (when is drawn).

Author:
jaume dominguez faus - jaume.dominguez@iver.es

Method Detail

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                 java.awt.geom.AffineTransform affineTransform,
                 com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.FShape shp,
                 com.iver.utiles.swing.threads.Cancellable cancel)
Draws the text according. If this symbol has the text path set, then it is used as the text line, otherwise shp must be an FPoint2D indicating the starting point of the text and then the text will be rendered from there and following the rotation previously set.

Specified by:
